article_title: 8 Human Resource Trends To Watch In 2016

article_metadata.description: With a new year comes the annual desire to understand what may be the important Human Resources topics, issues, and insights in the months ahead. In 2015, we saw a number of new trends, and in 2016, the HR landscape is changing more rapidly than ever before. Read on for [...]
